name: Henry VIII's Beard Tax - The Game
name_original: Henry VIII's Beard Tax - The Game
description:
Henry VIII's Beard Tax - The Game. 

 Survive four seasons collecting tax for the King.

PLEASE play in full screen. (Working on scaling issues)

Every season The King will give you orders on what and what not to tax.

If you tax the wrong person you will be fined.

Make sure you collect each seasons minimum Tax collection or the King will have your head.

Try to survive all four seasons.

Coding, Game Design, Music, Sound design By Matthew Steed

Some Royalty Free Artwork Was Adapted And Used.
